select pbe.SEGMENTATION_ID as segmentationId, pbe.CONSTITUENT_ID as constituentId, pbe.GIFT_ID as giftId, pbe.ADJUSTED_GIFT_ID as adjustedGiftId, pbe.PLEDGE_ID as pledgeId, g.CONSTITUENT_ID AS giftConstituentId, ag.CONSTITUENT_ID AS adjustedGiftConstituentId, pbee.ERROR_MSG as errorMsg from POST_BATCH_ENTRY_ERROR pbee inner join POST_BATCH_ENTRY pbe on pbe.POST_BATCH_ENTRY_ID = pbee.POST_BATCH_ENTRY_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN GIFT g ON g.GIFT_ID = pbe.GIFT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ADJUSTED_GIFT ag ON ag.ADJUSTED_GIFT_ID = pbe.ADJUSTED_GIFT_ID where pbe.POST_BATCH_ID = #id#
order by CASE WHEN IFNULL($sortColumn$,'')='' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ASC, $sortColumn$ + '0' $sortDir$, $sortColumn$ $sortDir$ limit $offset$, $limit$
SELECT count(pbee.ERROR_MSG) AS count FROM POST_BATCH_ENTRY_ERROR pbee INNER JOIN POST_BATCH_ENTRY pbe ON pbe.POST_BATCH_ENTRY_ID = pbee.POST_BATCH_ENTRY_ID WHERE pbe.POST_BATCH_ID = #id#
